Title: Kin
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Fred Golan, VJ Boyd, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Ingrid Escajeda (executive story editor), VJ Boyd (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: While Raylan heads to the hills to find Drew Thompson, he discovers that Boyd is searching for him too on behalf of Wynn Duffy. Meanwhile, Colt tries to tracks down Ellen Mae after she runs away.
